name: Folamour DJ set

For this special time of his carrer and to celebrate this journey shared with his people, Folamour is doing a tour in four European cities next February: London, Paris, Amsterdam and Berlin. name: BIRRD
desc:
Auteur d‚Äôune musique √©lectronique qui peut autant se danser dans l‚Äôobscurit√© d‚Äôun club
qu‚Äô√™tre √©cout√©e sur une plage ensoleill√©e, Birrd cr√©√© des harmonies cosmiques, inspir√©es

des synth√©tiseurs tritur√©s, d√©compos√©s et r√©assembl√©s pour faire na√Ætre une version toute
personnelle de la musique des machines : profond√©ment m√©lodique.

Ils y sont, mais bien malin celui qui saura les retrouver : comme sur son premier EP ¬´ Alba ¬ª,
Birrd est all√© enregistrer des sons en pleine nature pour nourrir sa musique √©lectronique. Les
vagues, les m√¢ts des bateaux qui s‚Äôentrechoquent au port, le vent, les galets ou les brindilles qui
craquent en haut des falaises se nichent dans ¬´ Alter Echo ¬ª, mais √©tir√©s, tronqu√©s, malmen√©s,
jusqu‚Äô√† en devenir m√©connaissables. Cette mati√®re premi√®re a √©t√© capt√©e √† Crozon, dans le
Finist√®re. Un paysage brut, d√©peupl√©, √† la m√©t√©o changeante, aux vagues et aux vents violents
qui a visc√©ralement influenc√© les sept titres de l‚ÄôEP compos√© et arrang√© par Birrd, mix√© par
Juxe (Nekfeu, Darryl Zeuja) et masteris√© par Antoine Thibaudeau (Thylacine, French 79).

Ce bout du monde a inspir√© au producteur franco-am√©ricano-italien une descente dans les
profondeurs. Celles de l‚Äôoc√©an d‚Äôabord : √† l‚Äôimage des visites guid√©es musicales qu‚Äôil a cr√©√©es
et anim√©es pour le Louvre, concr√©tis√©es par la sortie de l‚ÄôEP ¬´ Nocturne insolite au Louvre ¬ª,
¬´ Alter Echo ¬ª est un parcours, un aller-retour entre la surface et les ab√Æmes. Mais la plong√©e
est aussi musicale que narrative : m√™me si la lumi√®re du soleil perce au gr√© d‚Äôune ligne de
synth√© r√™veuse (¬´ 20 Meters ¬ª), d‚Äôune voix invit√©e (¬´ Submarine Queen ¬ª) ou d‚Äôun retour
imag√© √† la terre ferme (¬´ Morgat ¬ª), ce voyage est plus sombre, plus froid, plus tendu que
sur ses pr√©c√©dentes sorties, et la techno m√©lodique de Birrd se fait parfois abyssale. De quoi
gorger d‚Äôencore plus d‚Äôintensit√© ses lives qui, sans omettre des respirations en forme de phases
m√©lodiques planantes, font la part belle aux kicks, √† un light show soign√© et √† la danse. Un juste
√©quilibre approuv√© par l‚ÄôAmsterdam Dance Event, les Trans Musicales de Rennes ou encore
NTO, Fakear, Mezerg et French 79 dont il a partag√© les plateaux.

‚Ä¢ AmZik

AmZik, traduit par "Comme avant", est un groupe de musique d'expression kabyle fond√© en 2015 par les fr√®res jumeaux Nonor et Karim Belkadi, ainsi que leur ami Khireddine Kati. Il incarne la fusion entre les rythmes traditionnels et les sonorit√©s contemporaines. Leur rencontre en France a scell√© leur amour commun pour la musique et a donn√© naissance √† AmZik. Initi√©s par leurs reprises de chansons embl√©matiques de la musique kabyle sur les r√©seaux sociaux, ils ont conquis un public fervent. Leur premier album, "Asuyun Temzi", est sorti en 2016, suivi en 2021 par "Atas", suscitant un engouement encore plus vaste. Bien au-del√† d'un simple groupe, AmZik est devenu un symbole de l'identit√© et de la culture kabyle, transmettant avec passion et modernit√© les traditions et les valeurs aux nouvelles g√©n√©rations.

N√© √† Marrakech, il s'est immerg√© dans les musiques traditionnelles marocaines d√®s son jeune √¢ge, particuli√®rement la musique Gnawa. √Ä 14 ans, il forme son propre groupe, d√©veloppant ses comp√©tences en chant et en instruments √† cordes. Install√© en France √† la fin des ann√©es 80, il devient un membre cl√© de l'Orchestre National de Barb√®s, marquant les ann√©es 90 avec un style musical novateur m√™lant rythmes maghr√©bins, jazz et fusion. desc:
[English below]

Apr√®s deux √©ditions incroyable ann√©e 2023, Outdom est de retour au Cabaret pour une troisi√®me ¬°ùó¶ùóÆùòÇùòÉùóÆùó¥ùó≤?, en tr√®s, tr√®s bonne compagnie.

Pour cette troisi√®me √©dition, on a charg√© NICOLAS LUTZ de piloter le vaisseau Sauvage et de nous emmener ‚ÄúOutdom‚Äù, en dehors de tout domaine connu, pour nous faire d√©couvrir les pr√©cieux mais dangereux monolithes sur lesquels il a fait main basse. Depuis plusieurs d√©cennies, il semble que le fondateur de ‚ÄúMy Own Jupiter‚Äù et chasseur de vinyles a d√©velopp√© comme un ‚ÄúDisc Buster‚Äù, un pi√®ge unique capable de capturer tout objet circulaire renfermant quelque monstrueuse puissance.

Ce monument de la musique √©lectronique a b√¢ti sa r√©putation sur la minutie c√©r√©moniale avec laquelle il transporte des passagers du monde entier dans ses voyages hors du temps, et au cours desquels il leur d√©voile - enfin! - l‚Äôindicible √©nergie de ses tr√©sors d‚Äôoutre-Terre.

Pour l‚Äô√©pauler dans ce voyage, on ne pouvait imaginer plus percutant que de l‚Äôassocier aux ovnis de LUMBAGO. Les deux diggers lyonnais n‚Äôen sont plus √† leurs voyages initiatiques, et se sont maintenant forg√© un caract√®re rigoureux et t√©n√©breux au fil de leurs interminables recherches d‚Äô√©nergies lointaines. Comme ces jeunes capitaines flegmatiques qui, sous des traits innocents, d√©gagent cette impression qu‚Äôils ont d√©j√† men√© des milliers d‚Äôexplorations dans les abysses du cosmos, ils seront charg√©s d‚Äô√©pauler Nicolas Lutz et l‚Äô√©quipage d‚ÄôOutdom dans cette exp√©dition‚Ä¶ sans retour.

____________________

After two incredible editions in 2023, Outdom is back at the Cabaret for our third ¬°ùó¶ùóÆùòÇùòÉùóÆùó¥ùó≤?, in very, very good company.

For this third edition, we've entrusted NICOLAS LUTZ to pilot our spaceship and take us "Outdom" ‚Äì beyond any known domain ‚Äì to explore the precious but dangerous monoliths he has laid claim to. For several decades, the founder of "My Own Jupiter" has been hunting for vinyl records, and, like a "Gem Buster," it seems that through his explorations, he‚Äôs developed a unique trap capable of capturing any circular objects that contain some monstrous power.

This monument of electronic music has built his reputation upon the ceremonial rigor with which he transports passengers from around the world on his timeless journeys, during which he, finally, unleashes the unspeakable energy of his extraterrestrial treasures.

To assist him on this trip, we couldn't imagine a more impactful choice than to associate him with the UFOs of LUMBAGO. The two Lyon-based diggers are no longer on their initiatory journeys and have now forged a rigorous and dark character through their insatiable searches for distant energies. 

Like these young phlegmatic captains who, despite their innocent traits, radiate this reassuring impression that they‚Äôve already led thousands of explorations into the abysses of the cosmos, they will be tasked with supporting Nicolas Lutz and the Outdom crew on this expedition... with no return.

Embrace your loved ones and embark with us as you feel your guts scream your relentless desire for something beyond‚Ä¶

If you dare.

BE READY üåä Afro House & Melodic Techno with FAHLBERG!

A new trip to Sweden with the country's leading house and melodic techno artist: Fahlberg [Moblack Records, Madoraindahouse]!

Parisian collectives TOTHEM and CACTUS join forces to bring you another unforgettable evening, at a venue you know well: the River's King barge. 
This time, the trip will take place only in the barge's CLUB, from 00 to 6 on Friday February 16!

A dancing journey,
Around the TOTHEM



----------- TIMETABLE -----------

TBA

------------- LINE- UP-------------


FAHLBERG [Moblack,Madoraindahouse]
Stockholm - Sweden 

Fahlberg, an avant-garde music producer and DJ from Stockholm, Sweden, has built a reputation for excellence on the electronic music scene. Supported by renowned DJs such as Solomun, Keinemusik, Black Coffee, Pete Tong and many others, Fahlberg has gained recognition for his unique music and consistent release of high quality tracks.

Fahlberg's music has appeared on notable labels such as Moblack Records, Madorasindahouse, Abracadabra Records, garnered millions of streams and reached the top 10 of the Beatport charts. In 2022, their track "Somebody" reached number two in the Beatport Melodic Techno chart and was one of the most streamed tracks of the year, as was their 2019 collaborative track "Chaka", which peaked at number one in the Afro chart by Beatport and became one of the most influential songs in electronic music in recent years.

Fahlberg's DJ sets are a true testament to his passion for music and his ability to seamlessly blend his own tracks with the latest, underground music acquired through years of research. With years of experience as a DJ and musical discoverer, Fahlberg's sets are a unique and dynamic representation of the electronic music scene.

"When I produce and play my music, I like to think about how it makes people feel like themselves. Music connects you to your true self. Even on a crowded dance floor, I want people to enjoy the music as if there were no one around." - Alexandre Fahlberg

name: Ordinateuf: Daytime at the dog house
desc:
Hey tod@s
With winter‚Äôs going at full force, there‚Äôs no need to say that some heat is urgently needed. And the dogs are coming to bring it this upcoming 17th of February with a daytime fiesta (12h-00h). We'd like to announce you that we‚Äôve finally found our new dog house that will shelter us that day - a whole new location in Banlieue proche accessible en m√©tro, that we‚Äôre eager to show you. (accessible PMR !) 

As for the sound providers for the festivities, we‚Äôre delighted to bring Alexia back to Paris. She killed it last time she was here, and she did it again the other day closing Hoppetosse in Berlin. Every time, it‚Äôs a treat. We‚Äôre excited to hear what‚Äôs gonna unfold, we‚Äôre in for a ride. Average Excel fans but also average discogs enjoyers, Molto Rafon and Tangz will cover the rest. 

Talking about sound, we‚Äôd like to introduce the sound-system covering the event. Suave Soundystem will be joining us with a world premiere outing of their new Quadraphonic system - tailored for the occasion. Music sounds better with good speakers or so we heard. 

As we already also mentioned during our last party, we‚Äôd like to remind everyone about their responsibilities and how we‚Äôre counting on every guests an irreproachable attitude towards the others and themselves. No forms of bigotry are tolerated. And look after anyone who could feel unsafe. If at any moment you‚Äôd need support, reach out to the organisers - we‚Äôll be around on duty. name: ¬°Slowciety Sauvage: Peach b2b Pearson Sound?
desc:
[English below]

Slowciety et Sauvage s‚Äôassocient une nouvelle fois pour une nuit sp√©ciale UK au
Cabaret. Et pour c√©l√©brer les retrouvailles, on invite l‚Äô√©toile montante de la sc√®ne
anglaise, Peach, au c√¥t√© du l√©gendaire Pearson Sound. Ceux d‚Äôentre vous qui ont eu
la chance d‚Äôassister √† leur back-to-back in√©dit lors de la derni√®re √©dition du Love
International Festival s‚Äôen souviennent encore. Ils r√©cidivent avec nous le 15 mars
prochain¬†au Cabaret Sauvage!

PEACH
N√©e au Canada, bas√©e √† Londres, la DJ et productrice Peach a rapidement fait sa
place gr√¢ce √† des DJ sets brassant un maximum de styles¬†: Hi-NRG sur-vitamin√©e,
house √©lectrique, techno implacable et m√™me quelques standards intemporels‚Ä¶ Que
ce soit dans son podcast mensuel sur NTS,
quand elle chauffe le Panorama Bar ou fait danser la foule de Glastonbury, ses sets
sont toujours remplis d‚Äôune √©nergie d√©licieusement contagieuse. Depuis quelques
ann√©es, elle s‚Äôaffirme comme productrice avec deux sorties remarqu√©es¬†: d‚Äôabord sur
le label de Shanti Celeste, et plus r√©cemment dans sa propre maison de disque¬†:
Psychic Reading.

PEARSON SOUND
David Kennedy a.k.a Pearson Sound est l‚Äôun des co-fondateurs du prestigieux label
Hessle Audio aux c√¥t√©s de Ben UFO et Pangeae. √Ä eux trois, ils forgent le son UK
depuis deux d√©cennies. Reconnu partout sur la plan√®te, ses productions, remixes et
dj-set m√™lent grooves rythmiques profonds, arrangements complexes et d√©tails
m√©lodiques √©xigeants. Sa track XLB s‚Äôest hiss√©e √† la premi√®re place du top de
Resident Advisor. Plus r√©cemment, sont remix de Xtasis est sans nul doute l‚Äôun des
plus gros anthem UK de la d√©cennie en cours. Du garage √† la funk UK en passant
par la jungle oldschool en plein revival, pr√©parez-vous √† de s√©rieuses secousses
sous le chapiteau.
_______________________
Slowciety teams up again with Sauvage for a very special UK night. For the
occasion, we invite the rising star Peach alongside legend Pearson Sound. Those of
you who were lucky to assist last year‚Äôs edition of Love International Festival
probably remember their hitherto unseen back-to-back. They will repeat the
experiment on your dancing souls Friday March, 15 th at Cabaret Sauvage!

PEACH
Canada-born, London-based DJ and producer Peach became well-known with DJ
sets that blend all kind of genres, ranging from ecstatic house to Hi-NRG bombs
going through crowd-lifting techno and timeless classics here and there. Whether
she‚Äôs recording her multi-faceted NTS radio show, getting the party started at
Panorama Bar or ingeniously delivering to the soaked masses of Glastonbury‚Äôs, her
sets are loaded with a contagious energy. Those past few years she‚Äôs arised as a
producer with two remarkable records, out via Shanti Celeste‚Äôs label and on Psychic
Reading, her own label she‚Äôs just started.

PEARSON SOUND
David Kennedy a.k.a Pearson Sound is one of Hessle Audio imprint‚Äôs founder
alongside with Ben UFO and Pangaea. Together they have shaped the UK sound for
the last 2 decades, making it heavier and weirder. Widely acclaimed, Pearson
Sound‚Äôs productions, DJ sets and remixes are all brought to life in high fidelity with
dark rhythmic grooves, complex percussive arrangements and exacting melodic
details. His track XLB made it to the top of Resident Advisor tracks‚Äô pool and his
remix of Nick L√©on‚Äôs Xtasis is one of the biggest anthem UK scene has produced
those past few years. From UK funky to garage and oldschool jungle in full revival,
expect some serious tremor under the big top!

‚ñ¨‚ñ¨ NOS ARTISTES ‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨‚ñ¨

Rafael Cerato (DIYNAMIC) : 
The Aix-en-Provence/Marseille based Rafael Cerato is known for blending emotional and percussive sounds with Rolling and powerful basslines, adding his own vocals and guitar with a touch Of New Wave, Dark Disco synth vibes. Releasing selectively on respected labels such as Systematic Recordings, Diynamic Music and Stil Vor Talent, Rafael Cerato also runs his own label and events Ritual. Rafael finally drops a long awaited debut studio album on Marc Romboy‚Äôs Systematic in 2020. Already 8 years of touring around the world to play in most famous clubs from Ibiza to Australia, Brazil to Russia, Asia to South Africa to name a few, Rafael is writing his own story years after years.

Kobaien : 
KOBAIEN is a Parisian electronic music producer and DJ.
In 2022, he releases ¬´ Zimbabwe¬ª track on Moblack then "In your Heart" on Wired records which he meets a
great success with. Tracks is supported by Black Coffee, Keinemusik and many
other djs.
His first solo track, signed on Giving Records, is called ¬´ The Call ¬ª, with the sublime voice of the singer Brume. This melancholic sound, allowed him to rank, as soon as he was released, in the top 50 beatport. He created, in 2010, with Gesaffelstein and Yan Wagner, the new wave band Flying Turns. Also this year, he started his DJ career.

Ohm Vision :
The French native hailing from Paris is a rare talent with an uncanny ability to craft some of the most unique soundscapes you're likely to ever hear in the world of electronic music. His debut artist album, "Idealisation", was released on techno label SuperPosition Records. As a guitarist, Ohm Vision has always been passionate about music. His leitmotif is to ally emotion with unique soundscape in the genre of electronic music.

Ben Beckman : 
Based in France Media support including blog media coverage from CULTR, The Knockturnal and Radio Support from Ibiza Global Radio and BBC Introducing Sussex. Premiere release on Camel - (Organic House YT Channel) and Cafe De Anatolia's Coming out with his first original tune this year, Ben Beckman is back with his Layos EP, out now via Cafe De Anatolia. Though he only started releasing music back in 2019, debuting in the scene with his downtempo gem ‚ÄúAl Niyat,‚Äù Ben Beckman has experienced considerable success over the past couple of years due to his consistent release schedule and impressive talents in the studio.

name: DiscoStormy: Theo Terev & Seiji Ono, Raw Queen
desc:
DiscoStormy returns in Paris for its fifth instalment, this time in the temple of Soulful music for Paris: Djoon Club
Expect a serious disco beatdown with Theo Terev and Seijo Ono, both part of the 'You're a Melody' crew that travel around the world together to deliver the best grooves you can possibly hear!

DiscoStormy resident, Raw Queen will take care of the warm up!

****
After guests such as Rahaan, Mark Grusane, Zernell, DJ Amir or Admin, DiscoStormy, gathers the best selectors around the world for epic nights of grooves and dance.

LINE UP

THEO TEREV

DJ since 2007 and a founding member of the iconic Parisian collective La Mamie‚Äôs,Th√©o moves between Paris and London, leaving his mark in clubs that are symbols of international club culture (Corsica Studios, Oval Space, La Machine, Rex club, Badaboum, Concrete and many more). 
Off the back of his presence in Europe, Th√©o regularly tours in Asia and North & South America. With the vinyl he‚Äôs discovered from digging across the globe, Th√©o feeds predominantly the House scene, but also the Disco, UK Garage,
Acid and Techno scenes, always under the influence of an impetuous energy. Aside from La Mamie‚Äôs, he has a residency at Corsica studio‚Äôs London, with You‚Äôre A Melody, playing alongside artists such as Floating points, Red Greg, Mafalda and Charlie Bones.

Sensitive to his audience, Th√©o is compelled to captivate and be captivated by his fellow dancers in the room and to give back the love and energy he‚Äôs so often greeted with from his crowds that come to see him.

SEIJI ONO

Producer, DJ and label manager based in London, Seiji Ono runs vinyl reissues record label Melodies International alongside Floating Points since 2018 and has been a resident DJ of its internationally acclaimed You're a Melody parties.

Amongst his most recent work, Seiji Ono produced boogie originator Leroy Burgess' latest single Work It Out and major label artist Nariaki Obukuro with whom the Melodies crew toured Japan in July 2022.

Seiji Ono also hosts a monthly radio show on Charlie Bones' Do You Radio station as well as the Melodies International show on NTS.


RAW QUEEN
Raw Queen is a young and hungry DJ, and a rabid collector of fine music. An insatiable appetite for obscure private Modern Soul, Gospel, Disco and House rarities, Antoine has quickly made an impression with his mixtapes landing him visits to London, Bristol or Madrid. Back in Paris, Antoine
can be seen DJing in the city at musical hotspots Fr√©quence and Bambino and also runs the club night DiscoStormy (Previous guests include
Rahaan, Amir, Mark Grusane or Zernell). He also founded Kendama Records with whom he organizes house events in hot spots such has La
Java, La Marberie, Djoon Club...

name: Darzack
desc:
Ouverture des portes 19h30

Apr√®s, Rhizom et sa techno frontale et sans concession puis le psych√©d√©lique Advent Calendar, Darzack nous emm√®ne sur ses terres bretonnes, le long de la C√¥te d'√âmeraude, avec Drowning the Machines, un album plus intime et introspectif, fruit d'un travail au long cours avec le r√©alisateur Yann Perrin.

Tout est parti de l'envie de raconter l'histoire de la p√™che artisanale √† travers deux g√©n√©rations de marin. Le plus √¢g√©, au corps ab√Æm√© par la vie, voit son savoir-faire menac√© par la pollution des mers. Le plus jeune, amateur de soir√©es techno, y subit la violence de la r√©pression polici√®re. Le r√©alisateur et le compositeur relient dans un m√™me √©lan artistique et po√©tique la question environnementale et celle des violences polici√®res avec un hommage √† Steve Maia Cani√ßo, mort noy√© dans la Loire √† Nantes apr√®s une charge de la police. La force √©vocatrice des images associ√©es √† la musique de Darzack op√®re comme un rappel de la dimension historiquement politique de la techno.

name: Djoon: Mangabey & EG (all night long)
desc:
ü™©
Le vendredi 1er mars, Mangabey & EG livreront leur all night long signature au Djoon ! 

Anim√© par une passion grandissante pour les synth√©tiseurs et les bo√Ætes √† rythmes, Jos√© Fehner commence en tant que Mangabey en 2013, afin de m√©langer ses deux influences principales : jazz & black music. De cette dualit√© entre approche classique et une ambiance de musique de club plus moderne, Mangabey tire le meilleur de ces deux mondes. Depuis, il a cr√©√© son propre style en r√©unissant les techniques du jazz et la Chicago House sous un m√™me toit. 

EG est architecte de formation, aujourd‚Äôhui DJ de profession et productrice junior. Elle apprend √† mixer un peu par hasard pendant ses √©tudes d‚Äôarchitecture et lorsqu‚Äôelle fut de passage √† Londres pendant quelques mois, elle rencontre et se lie d‚Äôamiti√© avec la DJ et productrice Jayda G. Cette rencontre l‚Äôinfluencera beaucoup et la poussera √† assumer pleinement sa passion pour le mix. Son hypersensibilit√© auditive l‚Äôayant plong√© assez t√¥t dans un bain musical qui l‚Äôapaise et la canalise. Elle co-fonde le collectif Parasol en juin 2020 avec 4 autres DJs et en janvier 2021, elle lance sa propre cha√Æne de podcasts uto-pistes dans lequel elle interwieve DJs & music producers. EG est aussi r√©sidente au sein du collectif SOL R. Elle fait d√©sormais partie de la jeune agence de booking Bonne Nuit dirig√©e par Martin Abherv√© son fondateur. Niveau style, le spectre s‚Äô√©tend des ann√©es 90 √† aujourd‚Äôhui en oscillant entre soulful, garage et acid house en passant par l‚Äôitalo et la disco.

desc:

Propuls√©e en quelques ann√©es au rang d‚Äôic√¥ne techno mondiale, Sama‚Äô Abdulhadi est de retour au Rex Club et invite pour l‚Äôoccasion Nesa Azadikhah, dj iranienne √† la t√™te de la plateforme Deep House Tehran et qui vise √† donner un espace d‚Äôexpression √† la sc√®ne musicale √©lectronique de son pays. name: ATRIUM : LIVE CONCERT x DJ SET
desc:
| Atrium fait un retour en force avec un tout nouveau format de soir√©e (LIVE CONCERT + CLUBBING), ainsi qu‚Äôun line-up r√©unissant des talents et acteurs majeurs de la sc√®ne EBM-Indus locale et internationale. Pour cette premi√®re soir√©e de l‚Äôann√©e, Atrium a choisi d‚Äôinvestir l‚Äô≈íil, un lieu mythique de la sc√®ne parisienne queer et underground. 
La soir√©e d√©bute avec Faye Faeron, dont les sets aux influences New Wave n‚Äôont pas manqu√© de marquer les ambiances suaves des soir√©es Maison Pourpre. 
The Marquis is Dead encha√Æne et ne laissera personne indiff√©rent avec un live o√π riffs tranchants et marches monolithiques s‚Äôaffrontent dans des paysages sonores dystopiques. 
Aiver, notre duo r√©sident, ouvre le bal de la partie clubbing pour vous partager leur passion pour les paysages sonores immersifs inspir√©s de l‚Äô√©nergie des warehouse et de la culture underground.
Nostausgang, dont le g√©nie n‚Äôest plus √† d√©montrer, revient pour cette nouvelle √©dition apr√®s avoir r√©cemment sorti ses derni√®res tracks chez Eskimo Recordings, x-img et honor√© de sa pr√©sence les pr√©c√©dentes soir√©es Atrium.
Pour ce line-up, nous accueillons le talentueux The Undertaker‚Äôs Tapes, dont le dernier EP sorti sur le label d‚ÄôAncien Methods, Persephonic Sirens, parle de lui-m√™me. 
En closing, Minor Player, notre nouveau DJ r√©sident, vous transporte ensuite dans l‚Äô√®re post-industrielle des ann√©es 80 avec un set dont les sonorit√©s froides et m√©talliques sont incroyablement entra√Ænantes.

| Atrium is staging a comeback with a fresh event format (LIVE CONCERT + CLUBBING) and a line-up featuring prominent talents from the local and international EBM-Indus scene. For the inaugural event of the year, Atrium has opted to take over l‚Äô≈íil, a legendary venue in the Parisian queer and underground scene.
The party kicks off with Faye Faeron, whose sets, infused with New Wave influences, consistently leave a lasting impression on the suave atmospheres of Maison Pourpre's events.
Next up, The Marquis is Dead takes the stage, delivering a live performance that is sure to captivate with sharp riffs and monolithic marches clashing in dystopian soundscapes.
Aiver, our resident duo, initiates the clubbing segment, sharing their passion for immersive soundscapes inspired by the energy of warehouses and underground culture.
Nostausgang, whose genius is beyond doubt, returns for this edition after recently releasing tracks on Eskimo Recordings and x-img, and gracing us with his presence at previous Atrium events.
Adding to the stellar line-up, we welcome the talented The Undertaker‚Äôs Tapes, whose latest EP on Ancien Methods‚Äô label, Persephonic Sirens, speaks for itself.
To wrap up, Minor Player, our new resident DJ, transports you to the post-industrial era of the 80s with a set characterized by cold, metallic sounds that are incredibly catchy.

name: Foehn w/ Alex Picone, Oscar Faivre
desc:
F≈ìhn w/ Alex Picone, Oscar Faivre
‚ÜñÔ∏é‚ÜòÔ∏é  ‚ÜñÔ∏é‚ÜòÔ∏é  ‚ÜñÔ∏é‚ÜòÔ∏é  ‚ÜñÔ∏é‚ÜòÔ∏é 

Insta : @foehn.event
Date : 01/03/2024 00h - 08h
Place : Secret location - Paris 19e
Soundsystem : D&B Audiotechnik 
Scenography : New design by Atelier Cinetic
Capacity : 300 people  

For the 5th party of Foehn, we invite Alex Picone and Oscar Faivre. 

This time, we will explore a brand new location in the heart of Paris (19th). With a more club-like configuration than our warehouse parties, a cosy capacity of 300 people, curated acoustics and a scenography designed for the occasion, our sound-system will be blasting music in conditions that could hardly be more perfect.

We are also proposing a special format that is more than ever in line with our values and vision. A format however, that we rarely see happening in Paris, and that we would like to repeat regularly in the future. With two carefully selected artists per party and an 8-hour timeframe, we will curate pairs of compatible DJs, selected for their ability to achieve long sets with a special attention to the storytelling and to the creation of an atmosphere. 
 
For the first one, we invite Seekers boss, excellent DJ and producer, Barcelona based Alex Picone, with the support of upcoming Risky Booking resident, the Berlin-based Parisian Oscar Faivre. They will launch this series of parties that we believe will bring a sense of authenticity and freshness to our scene, while allowing us to live true immersive music experiences.
